mapper.insert: insert into threads( thread_name, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{threadName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
insert into messages( thread_number, message, created_at, created_name, updated_at ) values ( #{threadNumber}, #{message}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{contributorName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: select thread_number,message,created_name as contributorName,updated_at from messages where thread_number = #{threadNumber} order by created_at asc;
select thread_name from threads where thread_number = #{threadNumber};
